services.name: show100
services.copy: I don't have any Social Services for 'Show {0}'!`.

services.name: emptysub
services.copy: I don't have any Social Service sub-categories for 'Show {0} {1} {2}'!`

services.name: nothingmatched
services.copy: Sorry, nothing matched '{0}'; please use the Show [number] format.

services.name: rootunselectable
services.copy: Sorry, the top level Social Services are not selectable.

services.name: orgnotfound

services.name: associateorg
services.copy: I found the organization [{0}]. Would you like to associate it to your profile? (yes|no)

services.name: addorg
services.copy: Can I get the name of the organization you are associated to?
